document.full_text: after after shackleford worked five furlongs on saturday morning, his trainer committed him to a rubber match against the kentucky derby winner animal kingdom at the belmont stakes.
document.title: the rail: preakness winner to race derby winner at belmont
lines_and_colors: after after shackleford worked five furlongs on saturday morning, his trainer committed him to a rubber match against the kentucky derby winner animal kingdom at the belmont stakes.
